law.catch_line: Administrative regulations for absentee voting by military and overseas voters.
law.text: The provisions of KRS 117.085, 117.086, and Chapter 117A notwithstanding, the State Board of Elections shall, as circumstances warrant and with the concurrence of the Attorney General, promulgate necessary administrative regulations to preserve the absentee voting rights of residents of Kentucky who are covered voters as defined in KRS 117A.010.
law.history: Amended 2013 Ky. Acts ch. 131, sec. 21, effective July 1, 2014. -- Created 1991 (1st Extra. Sess.) Acts Ch. 17, Sec. 1, effective March 1, 1991.
